name: A Rabbit's Journey
description:
A Rabbit's Journey is a game about duality in which you play as a black rabbit who came in the mountains for a meditation retreat.

When the black rabbit start to meditate, a shape that looks and behave exactly like him appears and states the begining of the spiritual journey of the rabbit to accept his own duality.

We made this game with a lot of love and we really hope you'll enjoy it as much as we enjoyed to make it !
